pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy of the - AutoGadget AutoGadget Home About us Products Contacts Privacy Policy AutoGadget takes the privacy of its users seriously. This Privacy Policy describes the types of information we collect from users of this website and how we use that information. Information We Collect Personal Information: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, shipping address, billing address, phone number, and payment details when you place an order, create an account, or contact us. Non-Personal Information: We may also collect non-personal information such as your browsing habits, IP address, and device information. This information is collected through cookies and other tracking technologies. How We Use Your Information We use your personal information to process your orders, respond to your inquiries, and send you marketing communications (with your consent). We use non-personal information to improve the functionality of our website and to personalize your browsing experience. Your Choices You can opt out of receiving marketing communications from us by following the unsubscribe instructions in our emails. You can also control the use of cookies by adjusting your browser settings. Data Security We take steps to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no data transmission over the internet is guaranteed to be 100% secure. Changes to Our Privacy Policy We may change our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post any changes on this page so that you are always aware of the information we collect, how we use it, and under what circumstances we disclose it. If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us. The AutoGadget Gallery website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline Disclaimers Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions AutoGadget Car Accessories

User Accounts If you create an account on this website, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activity that occurs under your account. You agree to immediately notify AutoGadget of any unauthorized use of your account or any other security breach. Disclaimer of Warranties This website is provided "as is" and without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied. AutoGadget disclaims all warranties, including, but not limited to, warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. Limitation of Liability In no event will AutoGadget be liable for any damages arising out of or related to the use of this website or the information provided on this website.
